text: The Shores of Molokai is the 37th studio album by guitarist Buckethead, and the seventh installment of the Buckethead Pikes Series. The digital edition of the album was released on iTunes on August 9 while the physical edition of the album was released on August 25 (currently out of stock). ==Track listing== ==Credits== * Produced by Dan Monti and Albert * Mixing and programming by Dan Monti * Giant Robot's Remote Control by Buckethead * Baritone on track 4 by Brewer * Artwork: P Sticks ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date ! Label ! Format ! Country ! title: The Shores of Molokai (Buckethead album)
